title: ADDIE-Based Task-Centered Instructional Design Short-Intensive Course for Developing Fashion Education Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A competency-enhancement course for in-service secondary educators. Conducted as blended learning with real-time interaction and task-centered activities in digital-device-provided environments.

learning_goals: Apply the five-stage ADDIE model (analysis, design, development, implementation, evaluation) to fashion education content development
Design ≥3 learner-engagement fashion education scenarios using a task-based learning approach
Propose action plans that improve the effectiveness of fashion education models by ≥85% based on formative assessment analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
